mockStake().details: In production, this would handle actual token staking with slashing mechanisms

params.endpoint: Optional endpoint for communication (empty string if not needed)

params.reputationDelta: Change in reputation (can be positive or negative)

getVerifierWeight(address).notice: Get total weight of a verifier (stake * reputation)

incrementSubmissionCount(address).notice: Increment submission count for a Worker Agent

mockStake().notice: Stake ETH for a Verifier Agent (mock staking for PoC)

registerAgent(bytes32,uint8,string).notice: Register a new agent (Worker or Verifier)

slashStake(address,uint256).notice: Slash stake of a misbehaving Verifier Agent

unstake(uint256).notice: Unstake ETH for a Verifier Agent

updateReputation(address,int256).notice: Update reputation of a Verifier Agent (callable by consensus contract)
